messages.title: A Government that really represents the People
messages.content: Seize the DAY! May 6th gives you the opportunity to Change Britain for Good!

messages.title: On May 6th YOU have the biggest opportunity for a generation

keyPolicies.policyDescription: 1. A re-balanced, green economy. 2. Fair taxes. 3. A new, fair start for all children at school. 4. Clean, open politics.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Julian Brazil - A record of service to our communities for more than seven years.
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Working hard to achieve: Affordable housing for young local families. A louder voice for our communities. Less red tape. Preservation of our environment. A Fair Deal for our pensioners.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's Lib Dem or Conservative in Totnes! Labour and the Greens can't win here.

issues.environment: Local candidate Julian Brazil campaigning on the environment and for lower household bills.

housing.content: Affordable housing for young local families.

images.caption: Right: Julian campaigning recently in Totnes with Paddy Ashdown.
Local candidate Julian Brazil campaigning on the environment and for lower household bills.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Published and promoted by C. Frayling for and on behalf of Julian Brazil (Liberal Democrats) at 7 Park Road, Totnes, TQ9 5DA.
